Catch the spy!
On August 12, several official media outlets, including the Communist Youth League Central Committee, published content saying that social media has become a target of infiltration by "foreign forces" and that "foreign forces" are launching a psychological warfare against China.

If you have time to worry about foreign forces, you might as well worry about the Douyin comment area
Do you still need "foreign forces to incite" now?
The biggest problem facing you now is that people have begun to realize that their opponents are actually you.
